attributes.action: Allow UK citizens, vaccinated outside the UK to enter without quarantine.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe this change in the enter requirements will allow families to come back together after many many months apart. 
Travel is not just for tourism. It is to allow families to come back together safely and sensibly. 
Two vaccinations of Pfizer should be the same wherever it was administered.
attributes.background: Currently UK Citizens who are vaccinated outside of the UK will still have to quarantine when coming from Amber list countries. I propose ALL citizens with 2 vaccinations be allowed to enter without quarantine from Amber countries regardless of where they were vaccinated.
